text: Dr Gamini Abeysekera was the former Chairman of National Savings Bank (Sri Lanka), an economist and former UNICEF representative in Bangkok and advisor to the Prime Minister of Thailand.A man of economics and literatureDr. Gamini Abeysekera commemoration ==Early life and education== Gamini Abeysekera was educated at Nalanda College, Colombo and was a brother of Karunaratne Abeysekera. Gamini was a graduate of University of Wisconsin–Madison USA obtaining a PhD in Economics. == General references == * * * * * Category:Year of birth unknown Category:2004 deaths Category:University of Wisconsin-Madison alumni Category:Sri Lankan Buddhists Category:Alumni of Nalanda College, Colombo Category:Sri Lankan bankers Category:Sri Lankan economists
title: Gamini Abeysekera
